original: intros u v H. unfold Rbar_le. unfold LimInf_seq. unfold LimInf_seq in H. destruct (ex_LimInf_seq u) as [lu Hlu]. destruct (ex_LimInf_seq v) as [lv Hlv]. intros eps. specialize (Hlu eps). specialize (Hlv eps). destruct H as [N H]. exists N. intros n Hn. apply (Rle_trans _ (v n)). - apply Hlv. apply H. apply Hn. - apply Hlu. apply H. apply Hn.
